# Xata  
> Xata is a serverless PostgreSQL platform with instant copy-on-write branching, data anonymization, scale-to-zero and AI-powered database optimization.

## Platform Features  
- [Realistic Staging Environments](https://xata.io/realistic-staging-dev)  
- [Postgres Schema Changes](https://xata.io/postgres-schema-changes)  
- [Postgres Data Masking](https://xata.io/postgres-data-masking)  
- [Postgres Branching](https://xata.io/postgres-branching)  
- [Postgres Performance](https://xata.io/postgres-performance)  
- [Postgres Storage](https://xata.io/postgres-storage)  
- [Database Agent](https://xata.io/database-agent)  
- [Bring Your Own Cloud (BYOC)](https://xata.io/byoc)  
- [Postgres Analytics](https://xata.io/postgres-analytics)  
- [Postgres for Platforms](https://xata.io/postgres-for-platforms)  

## Company & Access  
- [Get Early Access](https://xata.io/get-access)  
- [About Xata](https://xata.io/about)  
- [Xata vs Neon](https://xata.io/versus-neon)
